LanguageData.Radioisotope_thermoelectric_generator.de: An electrical generator that uses an array of thermocouples to convert the heat released by the decay of a suitable radioactive material into electricity. Maximum power output is 500W
LanguageData.Radioisotope_thermoelectric_generator_Fr: An electrical generator that uses an array of thermocouples to convert the heat released by the decay of a suitable radioactive material into electricity. Maximum power output is 500W
LanguageData.ReactorCore.label: Reactor Core
LanguageData.ReactorCore.description: A nuclear reactor core is the portion of a nuclear reactor containing the nuclear fuel components where the nuclear reactions take place and the heat is generated
LanguageData.ReactorCore_Blueprint.label: Reactor Core (blueprint)
LanguageData.ReactorCore_Frame.label: Reactor Core (building)
LanguageData.ReactorCore_Frame.description: A nuclear reactor core is the portion of a nuclear reactor containing the nuclear fuel components where the nuclear reactions take place and the heat is generated
LanguageData.CoolingRadiator.label: Radiator
LanguageData.CoolingRadiator.description: A radiator system designed to heat very large bases while also cooling a nuclear reactor
LanguageData.CoolingRadiator_Blueprint.label: Radiator (blueprint)
LanguageData.CoolingRadiator_Frame.label: Radiator (building)
LanguageData.CoolingRadiator_Frame.description: A radiator system designed to heat very large bases while also cooling a nuclear reactor
LanguageData.CoolingWater.label: Water Cooling Station
LanguageData.CoolingWater.description: Provides large amounts of cooling to nuclear reactors by using cold water from rivers, lakes or oceans
LanguageData.CoolingWater_Blueprint.label: Water Cooling Station (blueprint)
LanguageData.CoolingWater_Frame.label: Water Cooling Station (building)
LanguageData.CoolingWater_Frame.description: Provides large amounts of cooling to nuclear reactors by using cold water from rivers, lakes or oceans
LanguageData.CoolingTower.label: Dry Cooling Tower
LanguageData.CoolingTower.description: Very large air coolers designed to provide large amounts of cooling for nuclear reactors when no natural bodies of water are available
LanguageData.CoolingTower_Blueprint.label: Dry Cooling Tower (blueprint)
LanguageData.CoolingTower_Frame.label: Dry Cooling Tower (building)
LanguageData.CoolingTower_Frame.description: Very large air coolers designed to provide large amounts of cooling for nuclear reactors when no natural bodies of water are available
LanguageData.Turbine.label: Thor
LanguageData.Turbine.description: A turbine driven by steam which turns a generator to produce electricity. The Thor has a maximum power output of 100 Kilowatts
LanguageData.Turbine_Blueprint.label: Thor (blueprint)
LanguageData.Turbine_Frame.label: Thor (building)
LanguageData.Turbine_Frame.description: A turbine driven by steam which turns a generator to produce electricity. The Thor has a maximum power output of 100 Kilowatts
LanguageData.BigTurbine.label: Zeus
LanguageData.BigTurbine.description: A turbine driven by steam which turns a generator to produce electricity. The Zeus has a maximum power output of 1 Megawatt
LanguageData.BigTurbine_Blueprint.label: Zeus (blueprint)
LanguageData.BigTurbine_Frame.label: Zeus (building)
LanguageData.BigTurbine_Frame.description: A turbine driven by steam which turns a generator to produce electricity. The Zeus has a maximum power output of 1 Megawatt
LanguageData.Transformer.label: High Voltage Transformer
LanguageData.Transformer.description: Provides the final voltage transformation from the Turbine Generators, stepping down the voltage used in the high voltage lines to the level used by power conduits
LanguageData.Transformer_Blueprint.label: High Voltage Transformer (blueprint)
LanguageData.Transformer_Frame.label: High Voltage Transformer (building)
LanguageData.Transformer_Frame.description: Provides the final voltage transformation from the Turbine Generators, stepping down the voltage used in the high voltage lines to the level used by power conduits
LanguageData.ReactorControl.label: reactor console
LanguageData.ReactorControl.description: Computer system designed to control nuclear reactors. Send a colonist to man the station to access the controls, multiple controls can be open at the same time
LanguageData.ReactorControl_Blueprint.label: reactor console (blueprint)
LanguageData.ReactorControl_Frame.label: reactor console (building)
LanguageData.ReactorControl_Frame.description: Computer system designed to control nuclear reactors. Send a colonist to man the station to access the controls, multiple controls can be open at the same time
LanguageData.storagePool.label: Storage Pool
LanguageData.storagePool.description: A storage pool for safely storing nuclear fuel rods. Right click with a selected pawn to interact and designate fuel for removal
LanguageData.storagePool_Blueprint.label: Storage Pool (blueprint)
LanguageData.storagePool_Frame.label: Storage Pool (building)
LanguageData.storagePool_Frame.description: A storage pool for safely storing nuclear fuel rods. Right click with a selected pawn to interact and designate fuel for removal
LanguageData.RadiationDetector.label: Radiation Detector
LanguageData.RadiationDetector_Blueprint.label: Radiation Detector (blueprint)
LanguageData.RadiationDetector_Frame.label: Radiation Detector (building)
